column4: Hey, do you guys think there is a netbook out there for ~$300 or less that could perform well with xubuntu or lubuntu (or maybe some other lightweight desktop)? What netbook(s)/distro do you recommend, or where should I search or ask about this? Thinking on maybe asking on a stackexchange, but not sure which one would be best..
Err, desktop, not distro. Though other distro recommendations are welcome too I guess.
lol Kolusion. And everyone else who waits less than two minutes for an answer on an IRC help channel. xD
i think most netbooks run ubuntu fast enough
